ygData.subject: Subject: RE: Imbrued gloves?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The torque is AC 7 +13 wis +13 int Weight 4 Shada, and I am wearing one for the AC. My monk friend was talking about getting on ehte other night; he must
ygData.messageBody:
> what's the stats on the mithril torque? i grabbed myself a runed lava pendant
> recently for the neck slot. i know the torques are easy as hell to get as most
> people don't care one way or the other if they get one, unless that has
> changed recently cause of its AC.
>
> Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> Tyria Sarkin, L45 High Elf Wizard
> <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server

The torque is AC 7 +13 wis +13 int Weight 4 Shada, and I am wearing one for the AC.
My monk friend was talking about getting on ehte other night; he must not have
looked at the weight on that.

Plus I am a master baker now. Try that with natural half-elf smarts LOL.

Maravana Vireo
50th bard of Jus Divinum
Mithaniel Marr
